neurotools.stats.gmm module¶

neurotools.stats.gmm.GMM(PCA, NCLASS=2)[source]¶

[ PDF = Pr(G) (2pi)^(k/2)|S|^(-1/2)exp[-1/2 (x-mu)’ S^(-1) (x-mu)] ] [ logPDF = logPr(G) k/2 log(2pi)-1/2log(|S|)-1/2(x-mu)’S^(-1)(x-mu) ] Pr is inverse monotonic with $logPr(G)-log(|S|)-(x-mu)’S^(-1)(x-mu)$
